faq.q: How many times should I look at this app?
faq.a: Depending on the Axon you do not have to look at it at all
Development guides can be found on the webpage
faq.q: How can I find the nervousenet webpage?
Can I make my own Axon/App
faq.a: Yes you can and should. Infos and simple examples can be found on the git repository
